SEARCH
Package org.carrot2.labs.smartsprites

Class SpriteLayoutProperties

java.lang.Object
org.carrot2.labs.smartsprites.SpriteLayoutProperties
public class SpriteLayoutProperties extends Object
Represents common sprite layout properties that can be used both in SpriteImageDirective and SpriteReferenceDirective.

    SpriteLayoutProperties.SpriteAlignment
    Alignment of the individual image within the sprite image.
